description: Fired for every trade_pool_change event, with token prices calculated, in the same format for all pools.
sql_insert: INSERT INTO price_pool (timestamp, transaction_id, receipt_id, block_height, pool_id, token_prices) SELECT to_timestamp((value->>'block_timestamp_nanosec')::bigint / 1000000000.0), value->>'transaction_id', value->>'receipt_id', (value->>'block_height')::bigint, value->>'pool_id', (value->>'token_prices')::jsonb FROM jsonb_array_elements($1);

endpoints.query: SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'pool_id', pool_id, 'token_prices', token_prices) FROM price_pool WHERE (($1->>'before_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id < ($1->>'before_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50;

SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'pool_id', pool_id, 'token_prices', token_prices) FROM price_pool WHERE (($1->>'after_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id > ($1->>'after_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 50;

SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'pool_id', pool_id, 'token_prices', token_prices) FROM price_pool WHERE pool_id = ($1->>'pool_id') AND (($1->>'before_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id < ($1->>'before_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50;
